bubbles.name: Refreshment
bubbles.description: +{% Sneaking EXP gain. Something about it makes you feel light on your feet, as if u just wanna fly...

bubbles.name: Gibbed Drink
bubbles.description: +{% Summoning EXP gain. No, the horn doesn't contribute to the flavor, just the fleshy bits inside.

bubbles.name: Ded Sap
bubbles.description: +{% Farming EXP gain, but dont drink too much since Eucalyptus oil is toxic IRL no joke fr fr search it or just take my word.

bubbles.name: Royale Cola
bubbles.description: +{% Jade Gain in Sneaking. Congratulations btw on trekking through World 6 like that what a journey!

bubbles.name: Mediocre Obols
bubbles.description: 1 random low-quality Obol. Sure, it'll probably be a crappy bronze Obol, but that's not bad considering youre paying with water!

bubbles.name: Distilled Water
bubbles.description: This distilled water was double-purified by running it through thousands of diamonds! So yea, it's just regular water, but more expensive.

bubbles.name: One Measly Gem
bubbles.description: 1 Gem. Perfect for buying things in the Gem Shop! Sponsored by LavaFlame2's Gem Shop!'

bubbles.name: Star Book
bubbles.description: Gives you a Star-Book! It's always the same one, but it comes with a random Max Lv, so keep buying it until you get one with a 100 Lv Max!

bubbles.name: Exp Balloon
bubbles.description: A small exp balloon. They give you exp in whatever skill you're currently training! Using them in town will give EXP in the town skill!

bubbles.name: Small Donation
bubbles.description: Your donation helps starving orphan monsters. They asked for food, but beggars can't be choosers! You wont get anything for doing this.

bubbles.name: Decent Obols
bubbles.description: 1 random low-quality Obol, except this time the 'low' was rated by someone with higher standards, so it's more like medium quality!

bubbles.name: Talent Point
bubbles.description: Gives a redeemable talent point for the 2nd Talent Tab. Applies to all characters. Also, this item's cost will never reset, never ever ever!

bubbles.name: Grand Obols
bubbles.description: 1 random Obol. It could be a super rare gold obol, but it's most likely gonna be a bronze obol.

bubbles.name: Bargain Tag
bubbles.description: Lowers the cost of the next bubble you upgrade by 25%! Can stack multiple times, but max is 90% off.

bubbles.name: Dense Water
bubbles.description: Sourced from the bottom of the Great Trench, dont drink this or you'll become dummy thicc or whatever!

bubbles.name: A Pair Of Gems
bubbles.description: 2 Gems. Thats two steps closer to buying everything in Gem Shop! Sure are a lot of steps for that one though...

bubbles.name: Empty Space
bubbles.description: There's nothing here buddy, but that ain't gon stop me from selling it to ya!

bubbles.name: Empty Space
bubbles.description: This is EXTRA rare nothing, sure ain't going for cheap!

bubbles.name: Empty Space
bubbles.description: There's nothing here buddy, but that ain't gon stop me from selling it to ya!

bubbles.name: Empty Space
bubbles.description: There's nothing here buddy, but that ain't gon stop me from selling it to ya!

bubbles.name: Talent Point
bubbles.description: Gives a redeemable talent point for the 3rd Talent Tab. Applies to all characters. This item's cost will reset every 50,000,000 years.
